Package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.link

Interface Link

All Superinterfaces:
Button
public interface Link extends Button
Defines operations for interacting with link components.

This interface extends Button and provides additional functionality for handling link elements, including support for double-click actions.

Author:
Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª

    • doubleClick

      void doubleClick(SmartWebElement container, String buttonText)
      Performs a double-click action on a link with the specified text within the given container.
      Parameters:
      container - The container holding the link.
      buttonText - The text of the link to be double-clicked.
